mapper.update: update $END2TABLE$ set ownercontract = #OWNERCONTRACT#, ownercontract$$master = #OWNERCONTRACTMASTER#, ownercontract$$class = #OWNERCONTRACTCLASS# where exists (select * from $VIEWTABLE$ b, $STRUCTABLE$ c where b.guid = c.viewfk and a.masterfk = c.end2$$master and b.templateid = #TEMPLATEID# and b.end1 = #OWNERCONTRACT#) and a.latestrevision like '%m%'
update $END2TABLE$ set orderitem = null, orderitem$$master = null, orderitem$$class = null where orderitem = #ORDERITEM# and ownercontract = #OWNERCONTRACT#
